channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: With So Much Uncertainty, Can You Reliably Build Generational Wealth From Passive Real Estate Investments?
item.description: From proposals to cap rent increases, all the way down to rent control, is the uncertainty in today's market enough to make investors leave it altogether?

item.title: The Asus ROG Ally X turns PC gaming into a portable console
item.description: A little more than a year after launching the ROG Ally, Asus is releasing a refined version of its portable device, the ROG Ally X. This Windows-based machine starts shipping on July 22 for $800. I’ve been playing with the portable console for a few days, and there’s already a lot to like — especially […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Five Things to Know About Kamala Harris’ Criminal Justice Record
item.description: Here’s where Vice President Kamala Harris, a former prosecutor, stands on important criminal justice issues.

item.title: Real Estate Investors Are Making These 6 Costly Mistakes. Don’t Be One of Them.
item.description: Investors in both stocks and real estate are making the same mistakes right now. Here's what you need to be aware of.

item.title: CIA AI director Lakshmi Raman claims the agency is taking a ‘thoughtful approach’ to AI
item.description: As a part of TechCrunch’s ongoing Women in AI series, which seeks to give AI-focused women academics and others their well-deserved — and overdue — time in the spotlight, TechCrunch interviewed Lakshmi Raman, the director of AI at the CIA. We talked about her path to director as well as the CIA’s use of AI, and the […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How Project 2025 Plans for Trump to Have Unprecedented Power Over the Justice Department
item.description: The policy plan for a second Trump term would turn the department against progressive local prosecutors.

item.title: Home Construction Is Undergoing a Revolution. Here’s How Investors Will Benefit.
item.description: Will we be able to hit "print" and generate housing one day? It could be sooner than you think.

item.title: What Kamala Harris has said about AI, tech regulation, and more
item.description: With President Joe Biden dropping out of the race, Vice President Kamala Harris may become the Democrats’ new nominee. In announcing his plans, Biden offered his “full support and endorsement for Kamala to be the nominee of our party this year,” while Harris said her “intention is to win and earn this nomination.” That said, […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Love Beyond Bars: Jules and Samantha
item.description: Jules and Samantha Werkheiser fought their wrongful convictions for over a decade. Here’s their journey of survival — and motherhood — in pictures.

item.title: Don’t Risk Your Money: Check These Stats Before Selecting Your Investment Market
item.description: Choosing the right market to invest in is your most important investment decision.

item.title: Joe Biden drops out of presidential race
item.description: U.S. President Joe Biden has announced he no longer plans to seek reelection, a decision that follows weeks of growing pressure from some Democratic Party supporters, including high-profile tech investors and executives. “It has been the greatest honor of my life to serve as your President,” Biden said in a statement. “And while it has […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Meet the New Generation of Unarmed First Responders in This New Podcast Series
item.description: “The Fifth Branch,” a podcast from The Marshall Project and Tradeoffs, examines new, alternative ways to respond to 911 crisis calls.

item.title: A World Without Airbnb & Why “Sinking” Could Cause Your Insurance to Skyrocket
item.description: Airbnb bans escalate, a “tsunami” could be coming for this real estate niche, and “sinking” cities lead to skyrocketing insurance prices. The housing market changes every week, so we’re here […]

item.title: Made by Google 2024: Pixel 9, Gemini, a new foldable and other things to expect from the event
item.description: Google is expected to announce four Pixel devices: the Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL and Pixel 9 Pro Premium, running Android 15. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: What We Know About J.D. Vance’s Legislative Action on Criminal Justice
item.description: On immigration and more, Vance has defended and legislated former President Donald Trump’s policy goals.
